really fun game i have been playing since it came yeah sure you might get mad in a few matches but still its really fun but im not a fan of the new update its really bad i spent hours grinding to get level 50 on all survivors and get perks but now i have to restart because i didnt prestige? its really not worth the grind for the "rewards" that they give you after you prestige they also made the perks worse for killers and survivors rating went from 10/10 to 8/10 still really fun and i will be playing more and more i recommend the game 100%

[h1] I hadst desire f'r this updateth [/h1]

[i] This patch is a big rick rolleth yond we all feeleth f'r.  I didn't useth the prestige function because yond wasn't the main focus f'r me.  Anon ev'rything is hath lost. Hopefully those gents fixeth this madness [/i]

Incroyable ce jeu !!

[h1]I really hoped for the best when the new Update (6.1.0) got out[/h1]

But after seeing, that I have to unlock all Perks for all Characters again after 1337 Hours of Gameplay AGAIN because I didn't press the ******* Prestige Button for all of them and stayed Level 50. I just can't and won't enjoy the Game until a Patch for this "Bad April Fools Joke"  is published.

It just seems so counter-intuitive and witless to reset loyal Players Work to reduce the tedious Bloodpoint-Grind. The Customer-Support seems to be ghosting me, too, which really hits the last Nail in the Coffin for me.

I am a casual player and solo was rough before, but now? It is not fun at all.
If you enjoy being face camped, tunneled or turned into a slug for the rest of the match, then this is the game for you.
If you like to grind for some measly points (if you are getting tunneled and face camped in most matches, you will be stuck in grind limbo for a very long time) to build up your character, this is the game for you.
More of a hook and gen simulator at this point.
Doing a gen takes forever.
I agree that killers got a lot of smack from toxic survivors; however, this update is not really newbie or casual player friendly.

Survivor is no longer fun after the July 2022 patch. Nerfed survivors while buffing the killers. As typically a solo queue survivor main I don't enjoy the game any longer since its almost impossible to escape without playing with 3 other friends. Everything about this new update which changed over 40 perks is just crap and I'll be uninstalling until the day they make survivor fun again. I hope whoever came up with this patch is jobless and homeless by the end of the year

played this game to get spooked by friends, made me horny for Pyramid Head instead

7/10

Before yesterday's update (19/07/2022), the game was already impractical for survivors wishing to play solo. The devs decided to give them the "coup de grace" (funny because it's a perk name) and obliterate any interest they might have had in the game. If you don't have 3 friends to play with all the time, don't bother buying this one.

From the killer's point of view, playing against a group of (decent) SWF remains a particularly horrifying experience but as stated in my first point, that's what the devs want to normalize :)
